alert.note: Alert for Big Belt, Bridger and Castle Mountains (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued January 15 at 11:07AM MST until January 18 at 5:00PM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY EVENING THROUGH THURSDAY AFTERNOON... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY HAS EXPIRED... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations between 6 and 14 inches possible. * WHERE...Big Belt, Bridger and Castle Mountains. * WHEN...From Tuesday evening through Thursday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult and tire chains may be required for some vehicles.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation. To see a graphical representation of the degree of stress on young livestock please visit our webpage and select Local Programs then Cold Air Advisory for Newborn Livestock.

area.areaDesc: Big Belt, Bridger and Castle Mountains
